job_title: SAP Order Management Business System Analyst (BSA)
jd: From: Steve, 3mkllc steve@3mkllc.com Reply to: steve@3mkllc.com Hiring: SAP Order Management Business System Analyst (BSA) – US Citizens ONLY - with 5-6 years of SAP Order Management Experience preferably in order processing, pricing, revenue recognition, customer & material management, delivery and shipping, invoice & billing processes, SAP ECC 6.0 or S4 HANA, SAP Data Migration tools (e.g. Informatica, LSMW etc.).Contract: Long TermLocation: RemoteRate: Open / hr JD: a) Candidates with 5-6 years of SAP Order Management experience preferably in data structure and processes.b) Good understanding of sales order processing, pricing, revenue recognition, customer & material management, delivery and shipping, invoice & billing processes etc. along with their table and field level detailed mapping.c) Familiar with order management transactions e.g. VA01/02/03, VL01N, VF01, VK11, XD01, MM01 etc.d) Familiar with order management tables e.g. VBAK, VBAP, VBUK, VBUP, LIKP, LIPS etc.e) Experience with SAP ECC 6.0 or S4 HANA.f) Excellent analytical, problem-solving and communication skills.g) Familiar with data migration tools (e.g. Informatica, LSMW etc.).h) Fair understanding of SAP data quality and data governance best practices.i) Preferred SAP certification in Order Management or related modules. Good to Have:1) Experience in SAP data migration, data warehousing, data governance frameworks.2) Experience with Agile project management methodologies.3) Certification in data quality or data governance.4) Experience leading data migration teams.5) Experience in order management reports e.g. sales order report, delivery report, invoicing report, pricing report, sales analysis report etc. and associated data structure details.6) Integration with other SAP modules e.g. SAP MM, FI, CO, WM etc.
